message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our product with you! After considering your interest, I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. This is a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $10,500 right now.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand that $12,000 might be a bit high for you, but I'm still confident that our product is worth a premium. Considering your interest and the value it can bring to you, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11,500. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, $11,500 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $11,000.  This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can reach an agreement.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to get the best deal possible, and I appreciate your honesty. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $11,000. Considering the value it brings and the negotiations we've had so far, I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11,250. This is my final offer, and I hope you can meet me halfway.
